definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Artaxerxes (Pers. Artakhshatrâ, Spieg:APK 68, 207 LXX )Artacerchv, cf. BeRy on Ezr 4:23, Ezr 7:1 f. Ne 1:1) ´[[א]] Ezr 4:7 v. BD:102; [[אַרְתַּחְשַׁשְׂתְּא]] Ezr 4:7, [[אַרְתַּחְשַׁסְתְּא]] Ezr 7:1, Ezr 7:11, Ezr 8:1, Ne 2:1, Ne 5:14, Ne 13:6; Artaxerxes I, or Longimanus, son & successor of Xerxes, reigned B.C. 465 – 424.
